text: Are there small holes visible on young shoots?
Can you see larvae or caterpillars on the plant?
Is there presence of chewed leaf edges?
Are the growing points damaged or dead?
Do you see parallel rows of holes on leaves?
Is the crop less than 3 months old?
Are there exit holes at the base of shoots?
Is there stunted growth in affected plants?
Can you observe any moth activity during evening?
Are neighboring fields also showing similar symptoms?
